Gallery

Past year's Photographs

Aagaaz'14 was marked by one week of absolute ecstasy,
providing the budding artists a competing
platform in diverse fields such as music, dance, theatre,
photography, literature, fine arts, quizzing , debating and various sports.
Aagaaz'14 proved to be an avenue to be comforted from
the routine life and to embrace the fun and frolic
embedded with tantalizing professional performances from the college.
Have a glance on the eventful Aagaaz'14..
